body:
Hi everyone!

It's been about 6 months since I've been here, so I thought I'd see how things are going. For those of you that don't know me, I was a staff member here for a long time, and I'm a retired administrator for Avicus (as well as a map developer and official). If you have any questions, just keep in mind that legitimate questions will get legitimate responses, and stupid questions will get stupid responses... if I decide to answer them. Ask away!

Regards,
Mango_
body_tagged:

If you have any questions, just keep in mind that legitimate questions will get legitimate responses, and stupid questions will get stupid responses... if I decide to answer them. Ask away!

Regards,
Mango_
title: G'day, ask me anything!

replies.body: Hey Mango! How are you?
replies.body_tagged: Hey Mango! How are you?

replies.body: Are you ever coming back?
replies.body_tagged: Are you ever coming back?

replies.body:
Mangoo mate, long time no see!

How is life going? Any exciting news?



also please come back




please
replies.body_tagged:
Mangoo mate, long time no see!

How is life going? Any exciting news?



also please come back




please

replies.body: Hey mango!! What happened to your build server? (RIP ScizorV2)
replies.body_tagged: Hey mango!! What happened to your build server? (RIP ScizorV2)

replies.body:
Hey Mangooo!

Favourite food?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Mangooo!

Favourite food?

replies.body:
Eteh: Good, thanks!
SamuelJacob9: No plans at the moment.
Sayaah: Hey! It's going well, but as I mentioned above no plans to return at the moment.
ImRaging: It was rarely being used at the time so I closed it. Might still have some of the old files though.
idkryan: To be honest I don't have one, I like a lot of food. Mangoes are certainly up there though.

replies.body:
Hey mate!
Hope all is going well :D
replies.body_tagged:
Hey mate!
Hope all is going well :D

replies.body:
Hey Mango some new and good things have happened

Avicus has improved a lot - more players are coming in due to OCN having updated to 1.9
Avicus is 1.8/1.9 compatible
Atlas Plugin which is exciting bringing new features
Player count has increased a lot from before
2016 could be the year for Avicus to be revived

Hope you are good and doing well
replies.body_tagged:

Avicus has improved a lot - more players are coming in due to OCN having updated to 1.9
Avicus is 1.8/1.9 compatible
Atlas Plugin which is exciting bringing new features
Player count has increased a lot from before
2016 could be the year for Avicus to be revived

Hope you are good and doing well

replies.body:
MANGO! 

This S Team is reforming!

How are you doing? What's going on in life?

Is the glass half full or half empty?

Opinions on Avicus?

Opinions on me?

How are you doing? What's going on in life?

replies.body:
My opinion on Avicus is that it should bring back Experience because when there was experience everyone played Avicus. They need to bring back the old arcade maps too! I LOVED ARCADE!
Now no one plays...

replies.body:
Hi
Are you still sweet?
How's school and life?
replies.body_tagged:
Hi
Are you still sweet?
How's school and life?

replies.body:
Mangooooooooooo!

How are ya? You should DEFINITELY take a peak at the server in May, there's A LOT of features coming in through the new META (I dont call it an update because this thing... it will bring completely new things...) 

- YML is gonna be replaced with XML
- Maps will be able to have multiple objectives
- Monuments won't just be points, they can be sphere's, cylinders and etc!\
- And much, MUCH more.
replies.body_tagged:
Mangooooooooooo!

How are ya? You should DEFINITELY take a peak at the server in May, there's A LOT of features coming in through the new META (I dont call it an update because this thing... it will bring completely new things...) 

- YML is gonna be replaced with XML
- Maps will be able to have multiple objectives
- Monuments won't just be points, they can be sphere's, cylinders and etc!\
- And much, MUCH more.

replies.body:
Woah heaps of replies!

SnowSX3: Hey Snow! It certainly is, same to you.
Zegita: Sounds great, thanks for informing me :)
NovaLikesPvP: Haha not sure about that, but thanks.
Javipepe: YUS.
Tigger_The_Bear: You never know.
ThePizza: I'll hop on today! Favourite pizza is probably Hawaiian.
tozl: Heeey you're Peachy, right? Great to see you again!
GrapeSmoothie: G'day Greg.
resepugnev: Close enough.
FrostedCupcakez: Hey Jess! I'll make sure to do that haha. Life is going well, thanks.
Arigenn: Not sure about how you guys are managing at the moment, but things seem to be well! Make sure you're passionate about what you're doing, and always put people first.
FrozenSolstice: Hey, I'm going well, thanks. Glass is half full. Avicus seems to be doing better than when I left.
OnlyOnTuesdays_: Experience is good, but potential and passion is better.
Vobaseball12: Check previous replies!
99250: He's alarmingly tall now, I can't ride him to school any more unfortunately.
PokerFace: Haha not bad thanks, refer to other replies, and you seemed like a cool guy when I was around :)
DaFrozenBlaze: Of course! School is going really well but the workload has certainly picked up.
Zintenka: Really well, thanks, how are you? I'll make sure to check back in May!
